titles.title: De Soto National Trail Study Act of 1987
De Soto National Trail Study Act of 1987
De Soto National Trail Study Act of 1987
De Soto National Trail Study Act of 1987
A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to provide for a study of the De Soto Trail, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department, OMB.
Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources received executive comment from Agriculture Department. Favorable.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston with amendments. With written report No. 100-177.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 340.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources received executive comment from Interior Department. Favorable.

vote.text: Passed Senate with amendments by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.
Executive Comment Requested from Interior.
Subcommittee Hearings Held.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee.
Executive Comment Received From Interior.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported to House by House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs. Report No: 100-462.
Placed on Union Calendar No: 294.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Measure Signed in Senate.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 10/1/1987--Passed Senate amended. (Measure passed Senate, amended) De Soto National Trail Study Act of 1987 - Amends the National Trails System Act to designate the De Soto Trail, extending through Florida, Georgia, South Carolina, North Carolina, Tennessee, Alabama, Mississippi, Arkansas, Texas, and Louisiana, for study for inclusion in such System.
